snippet: Officers had chased the 17-year-old, Hakeem Kuta, after a complaint about teenagers smoking marijuana in a Bronx building lobby.
abstract: Hakeem Kuta, teenager who fell off Bronx rooftop while fleeing police officers who were told group of teens had been smoking marijuana, dies of his injuries at St Barnabas Hospital.
lead_paragraph: Officers had chased the 17-year-old, Hakeem Kuta, after a complaint about teenagers smoking marijuana in a Bronx building lobby.

headline.main: Bronx Teenager Who Fell From Roof While Fleeing the Police Dies
headline.print_headline: Teenager Who Fell Off Roof While Fleeing the Police Dies
